name: BM-21 Grad
description: Soviet-made rocket artillery system that can launch 40 122mm rockets at once.

name: BM-27 Uragan
description: Soviet-made multiple launch rocket system that can fire up to 16 220mm rockets at a range of up to 35km.

name: BM-30 Smerch
description: Soviet-made multiple launch rocket system that can fire up to 12 300mm rockets at a range of up to 90km.

name: TOS-1 Buratino
description: Russian-made flamethrower multiple rocket launcher that can launch thermobaric rockets at a range of up to 6km.

name: BM-21V Grad-V
description: Upgraded version of the BM-21 Grad that has improved accuracy and firing range.

name: Tornado-G
description: Russian-made multiple launch rocket system that can fire up to 12 122mm or 220mm rockets at a range of up to 120km.

name: Iskander-M
description: Russian-made mobile ballistic missile system that can launch a variety of missiles, including those with nuclear warheads.
